title: Mission to the Unknown
dialogue_disasters: Space Security Service, licensed to kill.
goofs: The Daleks announce their secret plan on the city's external loudspeaker system, where Cory hears it.

continuity_notes.name: Space Security Service (SSS)
continuity_notes.description: An Earth-based organization with the authority to kill and give orders to military and civilian personnel.
continuity_notes.current_status: Active, aware of Skaro and Dalek ships

continuity_notes.name: Daleks
continuity_notes.description: Hostile alien race planning to invade the Milky Way galaxy

continuity_notes.name: Varga plants
continuity_notes.description: Plants created in Dalek labs that can transform humans into more Varga plants through their poisonous thorns

continuity_notes.name: Skaro
continuity_notes.description: Home planet of the Daleks, likely not in the Milky Way galaxy

locations.name: Kembel
locations.description: A hostile world avoided by most species
locations.current_status: Site of Dalek activity, six months before 'The Daleks' Master Plan'

future_history: Earth is the political center of the Solar System, which includes settlements on Mars, Venus, Jupiter, and moon colonies. Humans still use rockets for planetary landings. The constellations of Earth are renamed between 1995 and 3999, including Kasterborous, Mir, Canthares, Skytha, and Cetes.
untold_adventures: Dalek invasion 1000 years ago (actually closer to 1800 years)
additional_notes: This episode is unique as it does not feature the regular TARDIS crew, which was likely a shock to viewers. It was followed by a Dalek-less historical episode.
